# Skills checklist

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(kableExtra)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '', table_css = FALSE)

schedule <- read_xlsx("skills-checklist.xlsx")

schedule %>%
  kable(padding = 0) %>%
  collapse_rows() %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling(font_size = 12,
                            fixed_thead = T,
                            bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed"))
```
